price: Rárá o! À ń sọ òdodo lu irọ́ (mọ́lẹ̀ ni). Òdodo sì máa fọ́ agbárí irọ́. Irọ́ sì máa pòórá. Ègbé sì ni fún yín nípa ohun tí ẹ ń fi ròyìn (Rẹ̀ ní ti irọ́).
arabic: بَلۡ نَقۡذِفُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلۡبَٰطِلِ فَيَدۡمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٞۚ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡوَيۡلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: bal naqdhifu bil-ḥaqi ʿalā al-bāṭili fayadmaghuhu fa-idhā huwa zāhiqun walakumu al-waylu mimmā taṣifūna
